name: The Labyrinth of Far Water Grove
name_original: The Labyrinth of Far Water Grove
description:
A cute 3D perspective puzzle game, set in a fantasy world, in which players must change their perspective in order to solve optical illusions, and create impossible paths.

This was a vastly solo project that I created for my final year of university. the overwhelming majority of assets were created by myself, from the entire soundtrack to nearly all of the 3D models. The design, programming and production of the game was also a mostly solo endeavour.

I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed making it!
